Put mouse over identifiers to see inferred types 
 1: GHC.Types.Module{-# OPTIONS_GHC -fplugin=LiquidHaskellBoot #-}
 2: module GHC.Classes_LHAssumptions where
 3: 
 4: import GHC.Classes()
 5: import GHC.Types()
 6: import GHC.Types_LHAssumptions()
 7: 
 8: {-@
 9: 
10: assume GHC.Classes.not :: x:GHC.Types.Bool -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> ~(x))}
11: assume (GHC.Classes.&&)    :: x:GHC.Types.Bool -> y:GHC.Types.Bool
12:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> ((x) && (y)))}
13: assume (GHC.Classes.||)    :: x:GHC.Types.Bool -> y:GHC.Types.Bool
14:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> ((x) || (y)))}
15: assume (GHC.Classes.==)    :: (GHC.Classes.Eq  a) => x:a -> y:a
16:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> x = y)}
17: assume (GHC.Classes./=)    :: (GHC.Classes.Eq  a) => x:a -> y:a
18:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> x != y)}
19: assume (GHC.Classes.>)     :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> y:a
20:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> x > y)}
21: assume (GHC.Classes.>=)    :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> y:a
22:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> x >= y)}
23: assume (GHC.Classes.<)     :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> y:a
24:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> x < y)}
25: assume (GHC.Classes.<=)    :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> y:a
26:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Bool | ((v) <=> x <= y)}
27: 
28: assume GHC.Classes.compare :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> y:a
29:         -> {v:GHC.Types.Ordering | (((v = GHC.Types.EQ) <=> (x = y)) &&
                                    ((v = GHC.Types.LT) <=> (x < y)) &&
                                    ((v = GHC.Types.GT) <=> (x > y))) }
32: 
33: assume GHC.Classes.max :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> y:a -> {v:a | v = (if x > y then x else y) }
34: assume GHC.Classes.min :: (GHC.Classes.Ord a) => x:a -> y:a -> {v:a | v = (if x < y then x else y) }
35: 
36: @-}
